Citation

Cite the following article if the reference_regression_generator(), PurEst() or reference_based_beta_correction() functions have been used.

Sasiain I, Nacer DF, Aine M, Veerla S, Staaf J (?). “Tumour purity estimated from bulk DNA methylation can be used for adjusting beta values of individual samples to better reflect tumor biology.” Nucleic Acid Research Genomic and Bioinformatics, ?(?), ? doi:?.

Cite the following article if the beta_correction_for_cohorts() function has been used.

Staaf J, Aine M (2022). “Tumor purity adjusted beta values improve biological interpretability of high-dimensional DNA methylation data.” Plos One, 17(9), 20. doi:10.1371/journal.pone.0265557.
